item.title: Crew Oxygen System – Bottle Gage – SINGLE BOTTLE SYSTEM

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided pressure indication (EICAS) is operative.

note.para: Observe EICAS screen for minimum oxygen requirements as stated in chart found in Dispatch Maintenance Procedure 35-11-2-1.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "BOTTLE GAGE INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
